meanings.definition: Relating to the study of plant life in a particular region.
meanings.sent1: The floristic diversity of the forest amazed the researchers.
meanings.sent2: The floristic survey helped identify the native species in the area.
meanings.sent3: The floristic analysis revealed a surprising variety of plant species.
meanings.sent4: Her garden was a floristic paradise, bursting with colorful blooms.
meanings.sent5: The floristic patterns in the meadow changed with the seasons.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the types of plants present in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The floristic composition of the landscape influenced its ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: The floristic similarities between the two regions were striking.
meanings.sent3: The floristic arrangement of the garden seemed like a work of art.
meanings.sent4: The floristic tapestry of the forest painted a beautiful picture.
